11
12/*
13 * This file contains the function WebRtcSpl_SqrtOfOneMinusXSquared().
14 * The description header can be found in signal_processing_library.h
15 *
16 */
17
18#include "common_audio/signal_processing/include/signal_processing_library.h"
19
20void WebRtcSpl_SqrtOfOneMinusXSquared(int16_t *xQ15, size_t vector_length,
21 int16_t *yQ15)
22{
23 int32_t sq;
24 size_t m;
25 int16_t tmp;
26
27 for (m = 0; m < vector_length; m++)
28 {
29 tmp = xQ15[m];
30 sq = tmp * tmp; // x^2 in Q30
31 sq = 1073741823 - sq; // 1-x^2, where 1 ~= 0.99999999906 is 1073741823 in Q30
32 sq = WebRtcSpl_Sqrt(sq); // sqrt(1-x^2) in Q15
33 yQ15[m] = (int16_t)sq;
34 }
35}
36
